member.name: M:Elevel.Api.Controllers.TestController.CreateTestAsync(Elevel.Application.Features.TestCommands.CreateTestCommand.Request)
member.summary: Create test for "Start test" button without assignment. Recieves test level form body, UserId from token
member.returns: The whole test information Such as: * Id * TestNumber * Level * UserId * TestPassingDate * Audition with List of Questions with List of Answers * Essay * Speaking * List of GrammarQuestions with List of Answers
